-1.-2.content:
Thank you for sharing your background as a product manager at an e-commerce company! 🌟 I'm glad to help someone with your kind of background learn about transformers and large language models, which can be extremely useful for understanding advanced AI technologies in the context of e-commerce. 

I would love to know more about your purpose of learning this topic to tailor the course plan accordingly. Your purpose could greatly impact how we approach the learning journey. For example, if you aim to develop hands-on applications using transformers in e-commerce, we can focus more on practical implementation and case studies. On the other hand, if you seek a high-level overview for strategic decision-making, we can emphasize the business implications and use cases. Please share your purpose of learning below with as much detail as possible. 🚀
